text: Giuseppe Giacosa (21 October 1847 – 1 September 1906) was an Italian writer. He wrote the libretti (stories and words) with Luigi Illica for Puccini's operas La bohème, Tosca, and Madama Butterfly. He was born in Turin, Italy. Category:People from Turin Category:Librettists Category:19th-century Italian writers Category:1857 births Category:1906 deaths
title: Giuseppe Giacosa
